document.heading: Supermarket Tax Incentive Amendment Act of 1988

history.narrative: Law 7-173, the “Supermarket Tax Incentive Amendment Act of 1988,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 7-124, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 28, 1988 and July 12, 1988, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 15, 1988, it was assigned Act No. 7-229 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
